details.title: Telecommand Authentication in Space Missions: Cryptanalysis and Future Trends
details.abstract: An algebraic method is outlined to force the European Space Agency (ESA) telecommand (TC) authentication system, and we investigate more robust algorithms, by testing different operational modes of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), in conjunction with error correction strategies, already included in space recommendations.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
